title: Ancient Sun Temples of Prabhas region are testimony to legacy of Sun worship
India News | Ancient Sun Temples of Prabhas Region Are Testimony to Legacy of Sun Worship
description: Get latest articles and stories on India at LatestLY. In the Puranas, the Prabhas region is referred to as Bhaskar Kshetra because the Sun God was believed to shine here with his full radiant powers. According to legend, the Sun God dedicated 12 of his 16 divine rays to the 12 Sun temples in the Prabhas region, further underscoring the area's unique sacred significance.
